**Title:**

Upgrade Your Kitchen: Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Unscented Trash Bags (50 pack, 13 Gallon)

Discover the convenience and durability of the Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags. With a capacity of 13 gallons in every bag, you'll have ample space to keep your kitchen tidy between empties. These unscented bags are made from tear-resistant white plastic, ensuring they can handle even the heartiest waste without ripping or tearing.

The Flextra strength of these bags means they can stand up to daily use, and their red drawstring closure is both attractive and functional. With a count of 50 in each order, you'll have enough to keep your kitchen stocked for months. And with Alexa voice shopping capabilities, ordering more is as simple as adding it to your cart. Experience the difference of Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags today!
